thread.title: 2017 World Baseball Classic USA vs. Venezuela: Score, results, highlights, live blog
thread.title_full: 2017 World Baseball Classic USA vs. Venezuela: Score, results, highlights, live blog

author: R.J. Anderson
title: 2017 World Baseball Classic USA vs. Venezuela: Score, results, highlights, live blog
text:
4m ago • 1 min read 
The United States and Venezuela are kicking off their second-round schedule on Wednesday night. The winner will tie for Pool F’s lead, with a 1-0 record. The loser will find themselves in an 0-1 hole, all the while knowing that another defeat would almost certainly end their advancement hopes. 
However things go, we’ll be live-blogging all the action from San Diego -- highlights, observations, updated score, all that and more. Watch the game with us as we see what Team USA has in store for the second round ...
